meanings.definition: A small, round, savory Middle Eastern dish made of ground meat and spices.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious kibbis at the restaurant last night.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best kibbis for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The kibbis rolled off the plate and onto the floor, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the kibbis filled the room, tempting everyone to take a bite.
meanings.sent5: The kibbis, with its flavorful meat and spices, left a lasting impression on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: To engage in playful teasing or banter.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the kids would kibbis each other in good fun.
meanings.sent2: Friends often kibbis to lighten the mood and share a laugh.
meanings.sent3: Sarah couldn't help but kibbis John about his funny hat.
meanings.sent4: The siblings would kibbis back and forth, enjoying their playful banter.
meanings.sent5: The comedians on stage would kibbis with the audience, creating a lively atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A small, round, savory Middle Eastern dish made of ground chickpeas and spices.
meanings.sent1: The vegetarian kibbis at the new cafe was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make chickpea kibbis from a recipe online.
meanings.sent3: The kibbis made from chickpeas had a unique texture that I enjoyed.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the chickpea kibbis filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The chickpea kibbis, with its blend of spices, was a delightful twist on the traditional dish.
